clinical_study.brief_title: Menthol Flavored E-cigarette Use During a Simulated Ban of Menthol Cigarettes
clinical_study.official_title: Menthol Flavored E-cigarette Use During a Simulated Ban of Menthol Cigarettes

lead_sponsor.agency: University of Minnesota - Clinical and Translational Science Institute

clinical_study.source: University of Minnesota - Clinical and Translational Science Institute

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this formative study is to provide preliminary data regarding how the availability of menthol flavored e-cigarettes affects tobacco use behavior in the context of a ban on menthol flavored cigarettes

arm_group.arm_group_label: Usual cigs; menthol e-cig then tobacco e-cigs
arm_group.description: Participants can continue to smoke their usual cigarettes. For the first month of study they receive menthol flavored e-cigarettes and for the second month they receive tobacco flavored e-cigarettes

arm_group.arm_group_label: Usual cigs; tobacco e-cig then menthol e-cigs
arm_group.description: Participants can continue to smoke their usual cigarettes. For the first month of study they receive tobacco flavored e-cigarettes and for the second month they receive menthol flavored e-cigarettes

arm_group.arm_group_label: avoid menthol cigs; menthol e-cig then tobacco e-cigs
arm_group.description: Participants avoid smoking menthol cigarettes. For the first month of study they receive menthol flavored e-cigarettes and for the second month they receive tobacco flavored e-cigarettes

arm_group.arm_group_label: avoid menthol cigs; tobacco e-cig then menthol e-cigs
arm_group.description: Participants avoid smoking menthol cigarettes. For the first month of study they receive tobacco flavored e-cigarettes and for the second month they receive menthol flavored e-cigarettes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Self identify as African American
- smoke primarily menthol cigarettes
- be between the ages of 18 and 64
- smoke a minimum number of cigarettes per day
- agree to abstain from menthol cigarettes for an 8 week period
Exclusion Criteria:
- current unstable medical / psychiatric condition
- regular use any form of nicotine or tobacco other than cigarettes
- are pregnant or breast feeding
The investigators will evaluate if there are other reasons why someone may not be eligible to participate
